building_wrecking_yards.zhcn_desc: 被盗、被劫赃船于此处被拆成废铁。任何有价值的部件与合金都会被小心地回收。
building_wrecking_yards.en_desc: Stolen vessels and prize ships brought in by pirates are broken into scrap here. Any valuable components and alloys are carefully salvaged.

building_pirate_haven.zhcn_desc: 位于地表上的一座隐秘城市，海盗与流氓聚集于此修理舰船，顺带插科打诨。
building_pirate_haven.en_desc: A secluded and hidden city on the planet's surface, where pirates and other lowlifes can congregate to repair their ships and trade stories.

building_underground_clubs.zhcn_desc: 这些非法俱乐部可以满足宾客的种种邪欲。夜幕降临后，它们在星球上乌烟瘴气之处开始营业。
building_underground_clubs.en_desc: These illegal entertainment clubs will satisfy any vice. As night descends, they are open for business in the planet's seedier districts.

building_syndicate_outreach_office.zhcn_desc: 这些企业表面合法，可以掩护当地犯罪集团的非法活动。
building_syndicate_outreach_office.en_desc: These above-the-board businesses allow the local criminal syndicate to operate behind a veneer of upstanding legality.

building_illicit_research_labs.zhcn_desc: 这些秘密实验室里进行着各种极端非法的研究。
building_illicit_research_labs.en_desc: All manner of highly illegal R&D is carried out in these secret laboratories.

building_smuggling_rings.zhcn_desc: 此违章太空港每天吞吐大量非法货物，由于区域隐蔽，加之行贿阔绰，目前仍未被发现。
building_smuggling_rings.en_desc: An unauthorized spaceport that remains off the records thanks to secrecy and generous bribes. Large volumes of illegal cargo passes through here every day.
building_smuggling_rings.zhcn_planet_modifier: 犯罪度：§R+50§!\n分部价值：§G+25%§!\n商人岗位：§G+1§!

building_temple_of_prosperity.zhcn_desc: 一座戒备森严的神殿，为建造它的大教会传播福音。
building_temple_of_prosperity.en_desc: A high-security temple that spreads the gospel of the Megachurch that built it.
building_temple_of_prosperity.zhcn_planet_modifier: 繁荣传道者岗位：§G+2§!\n唯心主义思潮吸引力：§G+50%§!

building_executive_retreat.zhcn_desc: 为企业高层人员而建的豪华度假村。他们可以在这高度安全的环境中品味当地的星球文化。
building_executive_retreat.en_desc: A luxurious resort complex for high ranking corporate officers. Here they can sample the local planetary culture in a high security environment.

building_xeno_tourism_agency.zhcn_desc: 该企业中介提供各种星际旅游的宣传服务，同时也为希望搬至企业空间的移民者提供就业福利与签约奖励。
building_xeno_tourism_agency.en_desc: This corporate agency promotes a wide variety of interstellar tourist attractions, as well as offering employment packages and signing bonuses to potential emigrants interested in relocating to corporate space.
